testcase.name: Search Watch on Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page..........................................passed When title of Home page is "Google Store for Google Made Devices & Accessories".passed Then user search watch on searchbar.........................................passed When title of search page is "Search results for: watch – Google Store".....passed Then user clicks on "Google Pixel Watch"....................................passed When title of product page is "Google Pixel Watch – Google Store"...........passed Then user clicks on buy button..............................................passed When title of product summary page is "Google Pixel Watch – Google Store"...passed Then user quit..............................................................passed

testcase.name: Purchase watch on google store
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page..........................................passed When title of Home page is "Google Store for Google Made Devices & Accessories".passed Then user search watch on searchbar.........................................passed When title of search page is "Search results for: watch – Google Store".....passed Then user clicks on "Google Pixel Watch"....................................passed When title of product page is "Google Pixel Watch – Google Store"...........passed Then user clicks on buy button..............................................passed When title of product summary page is "Google Pixel Watch – Google Store"...passed Then user choose color and check images.....................................passed Then user clicks on add to basket button....................................passed When label is "Added".......................................................passed Then user clicks on go to basket button.....................................passed Then user is on basket page.................................................passed Then user quit..............................................................passed
